CreateNetwork.description: A collection of properties for the new network; must include a Name, VLAN ID, and an IP address range. NICs can be assigned to this network on creation by quoting their xnames. If an IPv6 prefix is given, IPv6 addresses will be assigned to each NIC when its MAC is learned.

netCIDR.description: CIDR representation of IP addresses belonging to the network

nicXnames.description: Array of NIC xnames belonging to the network

nodeClass.description: Type of node on the high-speed network. It could be of type compute, gateway, service, clusterstor, or uas.

nodeName.description: Name of the node on the high-speed network that was allocated the IPv4 address

NIC.description: A Network Interface Controller. This represents the connection between a Node and the Fabric. The information returned includes the NIC xname, host name of the node that contains the NIC, and the type of the node. Also included are IPv4 and IPv6 addresses if known.

Network.description: A description of the Network. It includes the network's name, VLAN ID, IP address range, IPv6 prefix and a table mapping IP address to Node name.

ipNodeNameMap.description: Table of node names and assigned IP addresses
